stimulusHtml: Which of the following best describes the reason for African Americans’ increased access to post-secondary education?

features.html:
Photo by HUM Images/Universal Images Group via Getty Images

American engineer, physician, and NASA astronaut. She became the first Black woman to travel in space when she served as an astronaut aboard the Space Shuttle Endeavour.

choicesHtml: The migration from urban centers into rural locales increased African Americans’ access to agricultural education.
The federal government administered educational funds to all African Americans who served in the military.
The labor shortages in industrial cities opened up opportunities for African Americans to access educational opportunities.
The founding of HBCUs created pathways for African Americans to access more educational opportunities.
